channel.title: MoparScape
channel.description:
I downloaded the software and can play the game, but I have a few questions about it. 1. How do you get the items? 2. Can you play with other people? Thank's for reading this.
-MO_Vannaka[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 12:40:20 PM[/size][hr]The MoparScape Software.

item.title: MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Threatening Threatening
item.description:
@Threatening wrote:

you must be playing using “start server” try going to| http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php |
then click on a server put the information it tells you etc…

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @BloodyRose BloodyRose
item.description:
@BloodyRose wrote:

To play with other players, go to a server list website, DON’T click create new server, click enter type in any username and password and press enter, you should be down by server ip: type in the ip from the server list for example justanexamplescape.no-ip.org press enter and if the server is online it should connect with other people!

Read full topic
